column2: x and xᵂ were reduced to h and hʷ in word initial position
lentition of intervocalic m to β
merge of labiovelars with plain velars
Law of Palatals: plain velars palatalized before front vowel
Bartholomae's law: aspirate followed by voiceless consonant becomes voiced stop + voiced aspirant
Brugmann's law: o in an open syllable lengthens
